title: Understanding De-stigmatization
text: De-stigmatization involves actions and attitudes that aim to reduce the negative perceptions and discrimination associated with mental health disorders.

title: Role of Nurses in Mental Health
text: Nurses play a crucial role in mental health care by providing support, education, and advocacy for patients with mental health disorders.

hintAnswer: nurses who actively work to reduce stigma surrounding mental health disorders
title: Identifying De-stigmatizers
text: Who are the individuals that actively work to reduce stigma surrounding mental health disorders?
choices: nurses who actively work to reduce stigma surrounding mental health disorders
